tool_description: Collects real-time indoor air quality sensor data from multiple device types and formats it for processing.

device_ids.description: List of sensor device identifiers to collect data from

metrics.description: Air quality metrics to collect: temperature, humidity, co2, pm25, pm10, voc, formaldehyde

error_messages: Device not found: One or more device_ids are not recognized or offline. Check device connectivity.
Invalid metric type: Use supported metrics [temperature, humidity, co2, pm25, pm10, voc, formaldehyde].
Invalid duration: duration_minutes must be between 1 and 1440.
Invalid sampling interval: sampling_interval must be between 10 and 3600 seconds.
Collection timeout: Unable to collect data within specified timeframe. Check sensor responsiveness.
usage: Provide device_ids array and metrics array, set duration_minutes for collection period. Optionally adjust sampling_interval for data frequency.

collection_id.description: Unique identifier for this data collection session

timestamps.description: Array of ISO 8601 datetime strings when readings were taken

sensor_readings.description: Raw sensor values corresponding to timestamps

total_readings.description: Total number of data points collected
